name: Absorb
description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Acid
description: The opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stat.

name: Acid Armor
description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

name: Acid Spray
description: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Acrobatics
description: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.

name: Acupressure
description: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its or its allies' stats.

name: Aerial Ace
description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

name: After You
description: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

name: Agility
description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.

name: Air Cutter
description: The user launches razor-like wind to slash the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Air Slash
description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Ally Switch
description: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies.

name: Amnesia
description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

name: Ancient Power
description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. This may also raise all the user's stats at once.

name: Aqua Jet
description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

name: Aqua Ring
description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.

name: Aqua Tail
description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

name: Aromatherapy
description: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user's party.

name: Assurance
description: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

name: Astonish
description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Aura Sphere
description: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.

name: Aurora Beam
description: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

name: Avalanche
description: The power of this attack move is doubled if the user has been hurt by the target in the same turn.

name: Baby-Doll Eyes
description: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always goes first.

name: Barrage
description: Round objects are hurled at the target to strike two to five times in a row.

name: Barrier
description: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

name: Baton Pass
description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting and passes along any stat changes.

name: Belch
description: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

name: Belly Drum
description: The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.

name: Bestow
description: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn't holding an item.

name: Bind
description: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

name: Bite
description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Blaze Kick
description: The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit more easily. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Blizzard
description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.

name: Block
description: The user blocks the target's way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.

name: Body Slam
description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Bone Club
description: The user clubs the target with a bone. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Bone Rush
description: The user strikes the target with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

name: Bonemerang
description: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops around to hit the target twice—coming and going.

name: Bounce
description: The user bounces up high, then drops on the target on the second turn. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Brave Bird
description: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Brick Break
description: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

name: Brine
description: If the target's HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.

name: Bubble
description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their Speed stat.

name: Bubble Beam
description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower its Speed stat.

name: Bug Bite
description: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

name: Bug Buzz
description: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Bulk Up
description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats.

name: Bulldoze
description: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of those hit.

name: Bullet Punch
description: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

name: Bullet Seed
description: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two to five times in a row.

name: Burn Up
description: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.

name: Calm Mind
description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

name: Camouflage
description: The user's type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water's edge, in grass, or in a cave.

name: Captivate
description: If any opposing Pokémon is the opposite gender of the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.

name: Charge
description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. This also raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

name: Charge Beam
description: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

name: Charm
description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers its Attack stat.

name: Chip Away
description: Looking for an opening, the user strikes consistently. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

name: Circle Throw
description: The target is thrown, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

name: Clamp
description: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user's very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.

name: Clear Smog
description: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are returned to normal.

name: Close Combat
description: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Coil
description: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

name: Comet Punch
description: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.

name: Confuse Ray
description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

name: Confusion
description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. This may also confuse the target.

name: Constrict
description: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles, vines, or the like. This may also lower the target's  Speed stat.

name: Conversion
description: The user changes its type to become the same type as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.

name: Conversion 2
description: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack the opponent used last.

name: Copycat
description: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

name: Cosmic Power
description: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Counter
description: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

name: Covet
description: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item.

name: Crabhammer
description: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Cross Chop
description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Cross Poison
description: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Crunch
description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Crush Claw
description: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Curse
description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

name: Dark Pulse
description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Defense Curl
description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

name: Destiny Bond
description: After using this move, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Detect
description: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Dig
description: The user burrows, then attacks on the next turn.

name: Disable
description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

name: Disarming Voice
description: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

name: Discharge
description: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. This may also cause paralysis.

name: Dive
description: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the next turn.

name: Dizzy Punch
description: The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches. This may also leave the target confused.

name: Double Hit
description: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or a tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Double Kick
description: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

name: Double Slap
description: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

name: Double Team
description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

name: Double-Edge
description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Dragon Breath
description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Dragon Claw
description: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.

name: Dragon Dance
description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.

name: Dragon Pulse
description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

name: Dragon Rage
description: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

name: Dragon Rush
description: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Dragon Tail
description: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

name: Draining Kiss
description: The user steals the target's HP with a kiss. The user's HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

name: Dream Eater
description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.

name: Drill Peck
description: A corkscrewing attack with a sharp beak acting as a drill.

name: Drill Run
description: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Dual Chop
description: The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal strikes. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Dynamic Punch
description: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. This confuses the target if it hits.

name: Earth Power
description: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target's  Sp. Def stat.

name: Earthquake
description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

name: Eerie Impulse
description: The user's body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Egg Bomb
description: A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum force to inflict damage.

name: Electric Terrain
description: The user electrifies the ground for five turns, powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.

name: Electro Ball
description: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the move's power.

name: Ember
description: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Encore
description: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.

name: Endeavor
description: This attack move cuts down the target's HP to equal the user's HP.

name: Endure
description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Explosion
description: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

name: Extrasensory
description: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Extreme Speed
description: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: Fake Out
description: This attack hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

name: Fake Tears
description: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.

name: False Swipe
description: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

name: Feather Dance
description: The user covers the target's body with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

name: Feint
description: This attack hits a target using a move such as Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.

name: Feint Attack
description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. This attack never misses.

name: Fell Stinger
description: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises drastically.

name: Final Gambit
description: The user risks everything to attack its target. The user faints but does damage equal to its HP.

name: Fire Blast
description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Fire Fang
description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.

name: Fire Punch
description: The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Fire Spin
description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

name: Fissure
description: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

name: Flail
description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.

name: Flame Burst
description: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.

name: Flame Charge
description: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then, building up more power, the user raises its Speed stat.

name: Flame Wheel
description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Flamethrower
description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Flare Blitz
description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with a burn.

name: Flash Cannon
description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it all at once. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Flatter
description: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also raises the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Fling
description: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. This move's power and effects depend on the item.

name: Focus Energy
description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

name: Focus Punch
description: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. This move fails if the user is hit before it is used.

name: Follow Me
description: The user draws attention to itself, making all targets take aim only at the user.

name: Foresight
description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

name: Freeze-Dry
description: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.

name: Fury Attack
description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

name: Fury Cutter
description: The target is slashed with scythes or claws. This attack becomes more powerful if it hits in succession.

name: Fury Swipes
description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes quickly two to five times in a row.

name: Future Sight
description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

name: Gastro Acid
description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.

name: Giga Drain
description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Giga Impact
description: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Glare
description: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

name: Grassy Terrain
description: The user turns the ground to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn and powers up Grass type-moves.

name: Gravity
description: Enables Flying-type Pokémon or Pokémon with the Levitate Ability to be hit by Ground-type moves. Flying moves can't be used.

name: Growl
description: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stat.

name: Growth
description: The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Grudge
description: If the user faints, the user's grudge fully depletes the PP of the opponent's move that knocked it out.

name: Guard Swap
description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with the target.

name: Guillotine
description: A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

name: Gunk Shot
description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. This may also poison the target.

name: Gust
description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

name: Gyro Ball
description: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user compared to the target, the greater the move's power.

name: Hail
description: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

name: Hammer Arm
description: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.

name: Harden
description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

name: Haze
description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

name: Headbutt
description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Heal Pulse
description: The user emits a healing pulse that restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Healing Wish
description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status conditions cured.

name: Heart Stamp
description: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the target less wary. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Heat Wave
description: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing Pokémon. This may also leave those Pokémon with a burn.

name: Heavy Slam
description: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move's power.

name: Helping Hand
description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally's attack.

name: Hex
description: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status conditions.

name: High Horsepower
description: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

name: High Jump Kick
description: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

name: Horn Attack
description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

name: Horn Drill
description: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

name: Hurricane
description: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also confuse the target.

name: Hydro Pump
description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

name: Hyper Beam
description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Hyper Fang
description: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Hyper Voice
description: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.

name: Hypnosis
description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

name: Ice Beam
description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

name: Ice Fang
description: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

name: Ice Punch
description: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.

name: Ice Shard
description: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

name: Icicle Crash
description: The user attacks by harshly dropping large icicles onto the target. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Icicle Spear
description: The user launches sharp icicles at the target two to five times in a row.

name: Icy Wind
description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers the opposing Pokémon's Speed stats.

name: Imprison
description: If opposing Pokémon know any move also known by the user, they are prevented from using it.

name: Inferno
description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.

name: Ingrain
description: The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn. Because it's rooted, it can't switch out.

name: Iron Defense
description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

name: Iron Head
description: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Iron Tail
description: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Jump Kick
description: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.

name: Karate Chop
description: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Kinesis
description: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. This lowers the target's accuracy.

name: Knock Off
description: The user slaps down the target's held item, and that item can't be used in that battle. The move does more damage if the target has a held item.

name: Laser Focus
description: The user concentrates intensely. The attack on the next turn always results in a critical hit.

name: Last Resort
description: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

name: Lava Plume
description: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn.

name: Leaf Blade
description: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Leaf Storm
description: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Leaf Tornado
description: The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp leaves. This attack may also lower the target's accuracy.

name: Leech Life
description: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Leech Seed
description: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

name: Leer
description: The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer that lowers the Defense stat.

name: Lick
description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Light Screen
description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks for five turns.

name: Lock-On
description: The user takes sure aim at the target. This ensures the next attack does not miss the target.

name: Lovely Kiss
description: With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on the target. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

name: Low Kick
description: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

name: Low Sweep
description: The user makes a swift attack on the target's legs, which lowers the target's Speed stat.

name: Lucky Chant
description: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits for five turns.

name: Mach Punch
description: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: Magic Coat
description: A barrier reflects back to the target moves like Leech Seed and moves that damage status.

name: Magical Leaf
description: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack never misses.

name: Magnet Bomb
description: The user launches steel bombs that stick to the target. This attack never misses.

name: Magnet Rise
description: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

name: Magnetic Flux
description: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

name: Magnitude
description: The user attacks everything around it with a ground-shaking quake. Its power varies.

name: Me First
description: The user cuts ahead of the target to copy and use the target's intended move with greater power. This move fails if it isn't used first.

name: Mean Look
description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

name: Meditate
description: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

name: Mega Drain
description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Mega Kick
description: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

name: Mega Punch
description: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

name: Megahorn
description: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.

name: Memento
description: The user faints when using this move. In return, this harshly lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Metal Claw
description: The target is raked with steel claws. This may also raise the user's Attack stat.

name: Metal Sound
description: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Meteor Mash
description: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also raise the user's Attack stat.

name: Metronome
description: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

name: Mimic
description: The user copies the target's last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.

name: Mind Reader
description: The user senses the target's movements with its mind to ensure its next attack does not miss the target.

name: Minimize
description: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.

name: Miracle Eye
description: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by Psychic-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

name: Mirror Coat
description: A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

name: Mirror Move
description: The user counters the target by mimicking the target's last move.

name: Mirror Shot
description: The user lets loose a flash of energy at the target from its polished body. This may also lower the target's accuracy.

name: Mist
description: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.

name: Misty Terrain
description: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.

name: Moonblast
description: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Moonlight
description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

name: Mud Bomb
description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. This may also lower the target's accuracy.

name: Mud Shot
description: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

name: Mud Sport
description: The user kicks up mud on the battlefield. This weakens Electric-type moves for five turns.

name: Mud-Slap
description: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

name: Muddy Water
description: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their accuracy.

name: Nasty Plot
description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Natural Gift
description: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines the move's type and power.

name: Night Shade
description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

name: Night Slash
description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Nightmare
description: A sleeping target sees a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn.

name: Nuzzle
description: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

name: Odor Sleuth
description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

name: Outrage
description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: Pay Day
description: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.

name: Payback
description: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.

name: Peck
description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

name: Perish Song
description: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

name: Petal Blizzard
description: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it.

name: Petal Dance
description: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: Pin Missile
description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

name: Play Nice
description: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: Play Rough
description: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

name: Pluck
description: The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

name: Poison Fang
description: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.

name: Poison Gas
description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon, poisoning those hit.

name: Poison Jab
description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

name: Poison Powder
description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.

name: Poison Sting
description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

name: Pound
description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

name: Powder Snow
description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also freeze the opposing Pokémon.

name: Power Gem
description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

name: Power Swap
description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with the target.

name: Power Whip
description: The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the  like to harshly lash the target.

name: Protect
description: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Psybeam
description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also leave the target confused.

name: Psych Up
description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

name: Psychic
description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Psycho Cut
description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Psyshock
description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

name: Psystrike
description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

name: Psywave
description: The target is attacked with an odd psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity.

name: Punishment
description: The more the target has powered up with stat changes, the greater the move's power.

name: Pursuit
description: The power of this attack move is doubled if it's used on a target that's switching out of battle.

name: Quick Attack
description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

name: Quick Guard
description: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.

name: Quiver Dance
description: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

name: Rage
description: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.

name: Rage Powder
description: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at the user.

name: Rain Dance
description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves. It lowers the power of Fire-type moves.

name: Rapid Spin
description: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

name: Razor Leaf
description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Razor Shell
description: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Razor Wind
description: In this two-turn attack, blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Recover
description: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

name: Recycle
description: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

name: Reflect
description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.

name: Reflect Type
description: The user reflects the target's type, making it the same type as the target.

name: Refresh
description: The user rests to cure itself of poisoning, a burn, or paralysis.

name: Rest
description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user's HP and heals any status conditions.

name: Retaliate
description: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this move's power is increased.

name: Revenge
description: This attack move's power is doubled if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

name: Reversal
description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

name: Roar
description: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

name: Rock Blast
description: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in a row.

name: Rock Polish
description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This can sharply raise the Speed stat.

name: Rock Slide
description: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.

name: Rock Throw
description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

name: Rock Tomb
description: Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat by preventing its movement.

name: Role Play
description: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target's natural Ability.

name: Rolling Kick
description: The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Rollout
description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.

name: Roost
description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Rototiller
description: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.

name: Round
description: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round to increase the power of the attack.

name: Safeguard
description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.

name: Sand Attack
description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing the target's accuracy.

name: Sand Tomb
description: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm for four to five turns.

name: Sandstorm
description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types. It raises the Sp. Def stat of Rock types.

name: Scary Face
description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.

name: Scratch
description: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

name: Screech
description: An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target's Defense stat.

name: Seed Bomb
description: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

name: Seismic Toss
description: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

name: Self-Destruct
description: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

name: Shadow Ball
description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Shadow Claw
description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Shadow Punch
description: The user throws a punch from the shadows. This attack never misses.

name: Sharpen
description: The user makes its edges more jagged,  which raises its Attack stat.

name: Sheer Cold
description: The target faints instantly. It's less likely to hit the target if it's used by Pokémon other than Ice types.

name: Shell Smash
description: The user breaks its shell, which lowers Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raises its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

name: Shock Wave
description: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack never misses.

name: Signal Beam
description: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. This may also confuse the target.

name: Silver Wind
description: The target is attacked with powdery scales blown by the wind. This may also raise all the user's stats.

name: Sing
description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

name: Skull Bash
description: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.

name: Sky Attack
description: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Sky Drop
description: The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky.

name: Sky Uppercut
description: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

name: Slack Off
description: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Slam
description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.

name: Slash
description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Sleep Powder
description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

name: Sleep Talk
description: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

name: Sludge
description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

name: Sludge Bomb
description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

name: Sludge Wave
description: The user strikes everything around it by swamping the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also poison those hit.

name: Smack Down
description: The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when it's hit.

name: Smog
description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. This may also poison the target.

name: Smokescreen
description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target's accuracy.

name: Snore
description: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.

name: Soak
description: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target's type to Water.

name: Soft-Boiled
description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Solar Beam
description: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

name: Sonic Boom
description: The target is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 20 HP damage.

name: Spark
description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Spike Cannon
description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

name: Spikes
description: The user lays a trap of spikes at the opposing team's feet. The trap hurts Pokémon that switch into battle.

name: Spit Up
description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack. The more power is stored, the greater the move's power.

name: Spite
description: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

name: Splash
description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

name: Spore
description: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

name: Spotlight
description: The user shines a spotlight on the target so that only the target will be attacked during the turn.

name: Stealth Rock
description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

name: Steamroller
description: The user crushes its target by rolling over the target with its rolled-up body. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Stockpile
description: The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def stats. The move can be used three times.

name: Stomp
description: The target is stomped with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Stomping Tantrum
description: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user's previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.

name: Stone Edge
description: The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Stored Power
description: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the move's power.

name: Storm Throw
description: The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

name: Strength
description: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.

name: String Shot
description: The opposing Pokémon are bound with silk blown from the user's mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.

name: Stun Spore
description: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

name: Submission
description: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.

name: Substitute
description: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user's decoy.

name: Sucker Punch
description: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

name: Sunny Day
description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves. It lowers the power of Water-type moves.

name: Super Fang
description: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target's HP in half.

name: Superpower
description: The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user's Attack and Defense stats.

name: Supersonic
description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.

name: Swagger
description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.

name: Swallow
description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more power heals more HP.

name: Sweet Scent
description: A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing Pokémon's evasiveness.

name: Swift
description: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

name: Switcheroo
description: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

name: Swords Dance
description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

name: Synchronoise
description: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.

name: Synthesis
description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

name: Tackle
description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

name: Tail Whip
description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

name: Tailwind
description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stat of the user and its allies for four turns.

name: Take Down
description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

name: Taunt
description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

name: Telekinesis
description: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.

name: Teleport
description: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon.

name: Thrash
description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: Thunder
description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunder Fang
description: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

name: Thunder Punch
description: The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunder Shock
description: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunder Wave
description: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

name: Thunderbolt
description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Tickle
description: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

name: Toxic
description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

name: Toxic Spikes
description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

name: Transform
description: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.

name: Tri Attack
description: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

name: Trick
description: The user catches the target off guard and swaps its held item with its own.

name: Trump Card
description: The fewer PP this move has, the greater its power.

name: Twineedle
description: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.

name: Twister
description: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.

name: Uproar
description: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. During that time, no Pokémon can fall asleep.

name: Vacuum Wave
description: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

name: Venom Drench
description: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.

name: Venoshock
description: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move's power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

name: Vice Grip
description: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

name: Vine Whip
description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

name: Vital Throw
description: The user attacks last. In return, this throw move never misses.

name: Wake-Up Slap
description: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however.

name: Water Gun
description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

name: Water Pulse
description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

name: Water Sport
description: The user soaks the battlefield with water. This weakens Fire-type moves for five turns.

name: Waterfall
description: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

name: Whirlpool
description: The user traps the target in a violent swirling whirlpool for four to five turns.

name: Whirlwind
description: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

name: Wide Guard
description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn.

name: Wild Charge
description: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. This also damages the user a little.

name: Will-O-Wisp
description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

name: Wing Attack
description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

name: Withdraw
description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

name: Wonder Room
description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

name: Wood Hammer
description: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Work Up
description: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.

name: Worry Seed
description: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target's Ability Insomnia.

name: Wrap
description: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and  squeeze the target for four to five turns.

name: Wring Out
description: The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP the target has, the greater the move's power.

name: X-Scissor
description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

name: Yawn
description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

name: Zap Cannon
description: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

name: Zen Headbutt
description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.
